query: Filter for tracks with stems, run an audio similarity search on 'Good Rockin Tonight A', and add the first 10 results to your Swinging into the New Year project

agent_response.message:
I'll help you with that multi-step workflow. Let me find tracks similar to 'Good Rockin Tonight A', filter for stems, and add them to your Swinging into the New Year project.

Finding similar tracks to 'Good Rockin Tonight A'...
Found 12 similar rockabilly/rock and roll tracks.
Filtering for tracks with stems... all 12 tracks have stems available.
Adding the first 10 tracks to your 'Swinging into the New Year' project (P012)...

âœ… Successfully added 10 rock and roll tracks with stems to your 'Swinging into the New Year' project. These tracks are perfect for your New Year's Eve celebration with their upbeat, party atmosphere and classic rock and roll energy. All tracks have stem files available for flexible mixing.

tracks.track_description: Vibrant rock and roll with a rough, country feel, feel-good, comedy, fun and games
Positive and lively folk with acoustic strums, rock n roll guitars and harmonica
Up-tempo, optimistic and funky, with classic rock guitar solo
Bouncing brass and piano rock n roll, enthused and energised, fun comedy and kids, cheerful and bright
Sixties rock and roll ballad, on the road to the graduation party, sunroof down and a well-oiled quiff!
Warming guitars strums crash over bouncing drums moving at a fast pace. Lively and upbeat with a playful feel. Summery raucous chorus adds a rock and roll feel

tracks.track_title: Lets Get Some Love - Instrumental underscore
tracks.track_description: Medium tempo blues classic rock instrumental track, positive feel - with dobro, harmonica, guitars, bass and drums
Seventies guitar fest: classic rock guitar and drum anthem with sporadic shouts of 'hey'
Powerful classic rock that's ready to hit the road with distorted guitars and stomping drums
Upbeat, catchy and welcoming. Bright guitar lines and thoughtful moments in this classic rock instrumental. Strong emotive piano lines build the emotional rousing atmosphere

project_update.confirmation: All 10 tracks have been successfully added to your 'Swinging into the New Year' project with full stem availability for flexible mixing during your New Year's Eve broadcast.
